content: baby hat and mitts set ~ laws of knitting baby hat and mitts set sizes hat~ baby toddler~ 16 17 / 40 5 43 cm circumference mitts~ baby toddle~ circumference- 4 5 / 10 12 5 cm length- 4 5 5 5 / 11 5 14 cm materials any dk yarn of your choice you will need approx 130 yrds to work up 1 hat and pair of mitts colors a your choice b your choice- 1 skein each color size us5 3 75mm 16 40cm circular needle 2 size us6 4mm 16 40cm circular needles or size needed to get gauge you will need to divide the stitches between the 2 circular needles when the stitches start to stretch too tight around the needle stitch markers 5 gauge 22sts and 26 rounds = 4 10cm in st st worked in rounds on larger size needle pattern ~ hat with smaller size needle and a co 90 95 sts being careful not to twist sts around needle place stitch marker and join for working in rounds work k1 p1 rib for 3 4 rounds change to larger size needle and color choice b work in st st until piece measures 4 5 5 / 11 5 12 5 cm at the same time placing stitch marker every 18 19 sts on the last round page 1 baby hat and mitts set ~ laws of knitting decrease round continuing in st st work until 2 sts before marker k2tog sm repeat at each marker until end of round work decrease round every round until 5sts total remain ◆◆if you want to make an i-cord at the top of the hat skip down to *i-cord* if you do not want an i-cord continue as follows cut yarn leaving an 8 20cm tail using your tapestry needle draw through remaining 5sts and pull to close pull tail to inside and weave in your ends *i-cord* slid the 5sts to end of one circular needle work i-cord as follows *knit all sts do not turn work but slide sts to the other end of needle drawing yarn up back of work * repeat from * to * until i-cord is the desired length cut yarn leaving an 8 20cm tail or longer depending on length of your i-cord using your tapestry needle draw yarn through the 5sts and thread down the center of i-cord and weave in your ends on the inside of the hat page 2 baby hat and mitts set ~ laws of knitting pattern ~ mitts cuff with color choice a and smaller needles co 22 28 sts place marker and join for working in the round being careful to not twist the stitches work rib as follows *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end repeat last round 6 9 more times body change to larger size needle working in st st work 3 rounds change to color choice b work in st st until piece measures 3 5 4 5
